EmailTemplate.name: Activate Enterprise.Send Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Is your ATM channel NextGen ready?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Banking technology is traditionally very siloed, but digital everything is changing this approach. Your ATMs need a new kind of architecture to keep up, to integrate with your banking technologies and meet the increasingly high expectations of consumers for banking in any channel. Read our recent whitepaper <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/activate-enterprise-whitepaper]]> to learn how NextGen architecture can help your financial institution and your customers…while making your channel as agile as you want it to be. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]>    <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]>       <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}">   © 2020 NCR Corporation. All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
